scripts.deployToRopsten: rm -rf build && source ../../testnet.env && source ../../infura.env && truffle migrate --network ropsten
scripts.deployToMainnet: rm -rf build && source ../../infura.env && truffle migrate --network mainnet
scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/Store.sol > flattened/Store.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Manager.sol > flattened/Manager.sol
